document.full_text: calling the case a "brazen and outrageous fraud," facebook founder mark zuckerberg urged a federal court to dismiss a lawsuit by a new york man claiming he owns a huge stake in the social networking website.
document.title: facebook, zuckerberg say ownership suit a "fraud"
lines_and_colors: calling the case a "brazen and outrageous fraud," facebook founder mark zuckerberg urged a federal court to dismiss a lawsuit by a new york man claiming he owns a huge stake in the social networking website.
